channel.title: Signal Community — Weekly Dinners at Yale
channel.description: Weekly dinners at Yale University connecting technical builders, entrepreneurs, and top-tier VCs. New Haven's premier startup community every Thursday.

item.title: Weekly Dinners at Yale - Join New Haven's Premier Startup Community
item.description: Connect with 10 technical builders, entrepreneurs, and top-tier venture capitalists every Thursday at Yale University. Meaningful conversations about building the future of technology and innovation in New Haven, Connecticut.
item.dc:creator: Signal Community
item.content:encoded:
Join Signal's weekly dinners at Yale University every Thursday. Connect with 10 technical builders, entrepreneurs, and top-tier venture capitalists in New Haven's premier startup community.

Our weekly gatherings bring together the most innovative minds in the Yale ecosystem for meaningful conversations about building the future of technology and innovation.

  • 10 carefully selected technical builders and entrepreneurs
  • Top-tier venture capitalists and industry operators
  • Weekly Thursday dinners at Yale University
  • New Haven's premier startup networking community
  • Focus on meaningful conversations about innovation

Apply to join Connecticut's most exclusive builder community.
